version_description:
Ver. 9.3.1 Update Details

Changes:
Quests have been added, allowing players to receive rewards for achieving various conditions
One Awoken Badge, received as a Quest reward, can be assigned per team
After completing a dungeon, players may now continue Multiplayer Dungeons with the same partner
Monsters eligible for Ultimate Devolution will be displayed in list form within the Evolution/Ultimate Evolution menu
The display of monsters eligible for Reincarnation has been revised within the Evolution/Ultimate Evolution menu
When filtering the Monster Box, etc., by Awakenings
Receipt expiration dates have been added to Magic Stone and Dungeons received via in-game mail

Bug Fixes:
- Multiplayer bugs have been fixed
- Other miscellaneous improvements

For details, from within the app see Others > Event/Update Info

Ver. 9.3.2 Update Details

Bug Fixes:
- Other miscellaneous improvements

For details, from within the app see Others > Event/Update Info

Ver. 9.4.2 Update Details
New Features:

Maximum Monster Box size has been raised from 3,500 to 4,000
The initial Monster Box size has been raised from 20 to 100. Existing players will also have their maximum Monster Box size raised by 80
The initial maximum team cost has been raised from 20 to 100. Existing players will also have their maximum team cost raised by 80
Mail may now be sorted before deletion
The number of monsters unlocked in the Monster Book is now displayed
Players may now continue Multiplayer play after a GAME OVER result

Changes:

In the Evolution menu, the monster thumbnail will no longer be highlighted in cases where only Ultimate Devolution is available
In the Quest menu, the title bar will no longer darken when there are unclaimed rewards
In Multiplayer play, friends' rooms found using the search feature will be displayed if the players continue playing for multiple sessions
When continuing Multiplayer play, the Friend Request option will only be displayed once

Bug Fixes:
- Multiplayer bugs have been fixed
- Other miscellaneous improvements

For details, from within the app see Others > Event/Update Info

Ver. 9.5.2 Update Details
New Features:

Players may now choose between displaying Multiplayer Dungeons to all of their Friends or to specific Friends
Now up to 30 monsters may be sold at once
Monsters may now be sold directly from the Dungeon Clear Results screen (excluding dungeons with Score displays)
A View Rewards option has been added to the Others > Options > Dungeon menu. When on, this option prevents players from skipping past the Dungeon Clear Results screen until they press the OK button.
Mail/Friend Invitations may now be sorted by expiration date.

Changes:

Players with the same Leader as you are more likely to appear as randomly selected Users
Mail/Friend Invitation sort options may be saved until a new message arrives
When continuing Multiplayer play, the Friend Request option will only be displayed once

Bug Fixes:
- Multiplayer bugs have been fixed
- Other miscellaneous improvements

For details, from within the app see Others > Event/Update Info

Ver. 9.6.0 Update Details

New Features:
*Eight new Latent Awoken Skills have been added, including "God Killer" and "All Stats Improved."
*Five new monsters, including King Flamtan, have been added. When used in Power-Up Fusion with a monster that possesses the same base skill, the base skill's monster has an 100% chance of improvement.

Changes:
*The Auto-Heal Latent Skill now heals 800 HP.
*Skill Transfer has been replaced with the Assist system, with relaxed restrictions and improved ease of use. A bonus is now added when the assisting monster possesses the same Attribute as the base monster.
*Players are now able to choose which Latent Skills are replaced by subsequent additions.
*The Sort by Subtype Monster Box filter has been replaced by the Special > Sort by Skill filter.
*Special effects have been added to the damage display when Killer-type Latent Skills have been activated.
*The Other menu's News and Quests items have been made into buttons, and are now located above the Magic Stones/Coins display.
*Sound effect and music volume may now be adjusted in the Others menu.

Bug Fixes:
- Multiplayer bugs have been fixed
- Other miscellaneous improvements
â€¢For details, from within the app see Others > Event/Update Info

Ver. 9.6.3 Update Details

Bug Fixes:
- Other miscellaneous improvements

For details, from within the app see Others > Event/Update Info

Ver. 10.0.0 Update Details

*The title screen has been revised.
*On the evolution screen, arrows have been added to indicate whether monsters may be evolved or deevolved.
*Special Sorting filters have been added to display monsters with available evolutions or deevolutions.
*When sorting by Assist, the Assisting Monster is now displayed next to the Base Monster. Monsters also benefiting from a stat bonus are also given priority in display order.
*"Combo Skip" has been added to the Dungeon Options menu. Toggling this ON skips the animation shown for 2+ combos. This option may also be toggled in the in-battle Menu.
*Tapping enemies in battle now reveals damage absorption/voiding information.
*When making a 10 egg multi-pull on the Pal Egg Machine, tapping and holding the screen allows the animation to be skipped.
*Rarity 6+ eggs now appear as diamond eggs.
*Maximum Monster Box size has been increased from 4,000 to 4,500.
*Bugs have been fixed.

* For details, from within the app see Others > Event/Update Info

Ver. 11.0.2 Update Details

*Options>System now included new Monster Box management options.
*"Fav." no longer takes precedence when sorting the Monster Box by non-Fav. criteria.
*The Guard Break Awoken Skill has been revised to reduce enemy DEF to zero when attacking simultaneously with 5 Attributes.
*At the Evolution/Ultimate Evolution screen, the thumbnail image for monsters that may only be deevolved is now displayed darkened.
*The bonus an Assisting Monster provides to the Base Monster is now further enhanced when the Assisting Monster is +297.
*Leader Skills for both the player and the Helper may now be confirmed via the in-dungeon Menu.
*Effects influencing the player's team may now be confirmed via the in-dungeon Menu.
*Available Orb movement time is now displayed when an Orb is tapped and held within a dungeon.
*Challenge Mode has a new option that rewards players for completing a dungeon with a team of three or fewer monsters.
*The Shop Increase Capacity now includes an option to expand the Monster Box by 50 slots.
*The Monster Point maximum has been raised to 9,999,999.
*The Mail/Invites screen's Sort/Delete feature now includes an option for Monster Points.

* For details, from within the app see Others > Event/Update Info

Ver. 14.1.0 Update Details

*Evo Material Monsters are now stackable.
*The Pal Point capacity has been changed from 25,000 to 50,000.
*Five new Latent Awoken Skills such as Fire Damage Reduction+ have been added.
*An Evo Search function has been added to the monster details screen.
*A sort feature has been added to The Monster Exchange.

* For details, from within the app see Others > Links > Official Facebook

Ver. 11.1.0 Update Details

*A new 3-Player Mode has been added. Coop partners are automatically searched for and may be brought to assist with the dungeon. (Monsters that grant bonuses to gained EXP and Coins may not be used as Leaders.)
*The 2-Player Mode's name has been changed, but the play style remains the same.
*In 2-Player Mode, connection wait times have been reduced to 30 seconds.
*The "Don't include read mail" selection in the Mail/Invites is now saved for future uses.
*Bugs have been fixed.

* For details, from within the app see Others > Event/Update Info

Ver. 11.2.1 Update Details

*Compatibility has been changed to "Requires iOS 7.0 or later."

*Two new Awoken Skills, including Improved Team HP, have been added.
*Eight new Latent Awoken Skills, including Evo Material Killer and Extended Move Time+, have been added.
*In 3-Player Mode, the Create a 2-Player Room and Create a 3-Player Room have been combined as Create a Room (Room ID).
*Bugs have been fixed.

* For details, from within the app see Others > Event/Update Info

Ver. 12.0.3 Update Details
*The Trade function has been added. It becomes available at Rank 110.
*A new Awoken Skill, Void Damage Penetration, has been added.
*Spectator Mode has been added to 3-Player Multiplayer.
*The Menu may now be accessed in Multiplayer Mode during a partner's turn.
*The effects of the Auto-Heal, Improved HP, and Improved Healing Awoken Skills have been adjusted.
*Expiration dates are now displayed for quest rewards.
*Assisting Monsters may be removed at the Manage Assists menu.
*When sorting the Friend List by Added, the number of days since adding is now displayed.
*Bugs have been fixed.

* For details, from within the app see Others > Event/Update Info

Ver. 12.1.1 Update Details

*Friend request messages are now deleted automatically after seven days.
*After a trade is successfully completed, an icon will now be displayed on the Friend screen's Trade section.
*Favorites are now taken into account when sorting the Monster Box by Monster Points.

*Bugs have been fixed.
* For details, from within the app see Others > Event/Update Info

Ver. 12.1.2 Update Details

*Bugs have been fixed.
*For details, from within the app see Others > Links > Official Facebook

Ver. 12.2.1 Update Details

*A new Awoken Skill, Awoken Assist, has been added.
*The Enhanced Heal Orbs Awoken Skill's effect has been adjusted.
*"Assist Evolution" has been added to the Evolution/Ultimate Evolution menu.
*Skill level up, Awakening, and Latent Awakening UI effects may now be skipped.
*Maximum Monster Box size has been increased from 4,500 to 5,000.
*The News display has been modified.

*Bugs have been fixed.

* For details, from within the app see Others > Links > Official Facebook

Ver. 12.3.3 Update Details

*Level limit breakthrough feature added.
*New Awoken Skills (Super Bonus Attack, Skill Charge) have been added.
*The conditions for adding a sixth Latent Awoken Skill have been revised.
*At the Sell Monsters screen, Favorited monsters are excluded when sorting by Monster Points.
*The Others > Limited Time Dungeon Schedule screen is now accessed by a button above the Magic Stone/Coins display.

*Bugs have been fixed.

* For details, from within the app see Others > Links > Official Facebook

Ver. 12.4.0 Update Details
*The conditions for adding a sixth Latent Awoken Skill have been revised.
*New Awoken Skills have been added: Resistance-Bind+, Extend Move Time+, Resistance-Clouds, Resistance-Immobility, and Skill Boost+.
*Ultimate Evolutions, Pixel Evolutions, and Ultimate Devolutions are no longer possible from the Power-Up Fusion menu.
(Ultimate Evolutions, Pixel Evolutions, and Ultimate Devolutions may be performed from the Evolution/Ultimate Evolution menu.)
*The Egg Machine display has been revised.

*Bugs have been fixed.

* For details, from within the app see Others > Links > Official Facebook

Ver. 12.6.1 Update Details

*A Super Awakening feature has been added.
*New Awoken Skills have been added: 80% or more HP Enhanced, 50% or less HP Enhanced, [L] Damage Reduction, and [L] Increased Attack.
*"Perfect Match" has been added to the Sort Awoken Skill filter.
*Tapping and holding an Awoken Skill in the Sort Awoken Skill filter screen displays detailed information.

*Bugs have been fixed.

* For details, from within the app see Others > Links > Official Facebook

Ver. 13.0.0 Update Details

*The base Orb movement time has been changed.
*The restrictions for adding a sixth Latent Awoken Skill have been removed.
*The Special Dungeon Score feature has been reset, and the rewards changed.

*Bugs have been fixed.

* For details, from within the app see Others > Links > Official Facebook

Ver. 13.0.1 Update Details

* Bugs have been fixed.

Ver. 14.0.0 Update Details

*The Monster Exchange has been added.
*A monster training function has been added, allowing monsters to be improved in dungeons.
*The Rank required to unlock the Monster Point and Monster Purchase features has been revised.

*Bugs have been fixed.

* For details, from within the app see Others > Links > Official Facebook

Ver. 14.0.1 Update Details

*The Monster Exchange has been added.
*A Monster Leveling function has been added, allowing monsters to be improved in dungeons.
*The Rank required to unlock the Monster Point and Monster Purchase features has been revised.

*Bugs have been fixed.

* For details, from within the app see Others > Links > Official Facebook

Ver. 14.1.0 Update Details

*Evo Material Monsters are now stackable.
*The Pal Point capacity has been changed from 25,000 to 50,000.
*Five new Latent Awoken Skills such as Fire Damage Reduction+ have been added.
*An Evo Search function has been added to the monster details screen.
*A sort feature has been added to The Monster Exchange.

* For details, from within the app see Others > Links > Official Facebook

Ver. 14.1.1 Update Details

*Bugs have been fixed.
*Other miscellaneous improvements.

* For details, from within the app see Others > Links > Official Site

Ver. 15.0.0 Update Details

*+ Point function has been added.
*Monster Enhancement function has been added.
*Evolution Materials have been changed for select monsters.
*Awaken Material monsters are now stackable.
*Filter function has been added to the Monster Exchange.
*Combo Skip option will be set to ON during multiplayer as the default setting.
*Monsters used for Awakenings are no longer selectable as base monsters in Power-Up Fusion.

*For details, from within the app see Others > Links > Official Site

*If the update does not appear immediately, try opening the App Store Update tab and swiping down on the screen until it refreshes.

Ver. 15.1.0 Update Details

*iPhone X display compatibility has been added.
*New Awoken Skill "Combo Orbs" has been added.
*Monsters may now be exchanged in succession at the Monster Exchange screen.

*Bugs have been fixed.

*For details, from within the app see Others > Links > Official Site

*If the update does not appear immediately, try opening the App Store's
Update tab and swiping down on the screen until it refreshes.

Ver. 17.2.0 Update Details

*"Ultimate Devolution" has been renamed "Devolution".
*Monsters who have performed an Assist Evolution may now be devolved.
*Select Awoken Skill effects have been upgraded.
*Bugs have been fixed.

*For details, see [Others > Links > Official Site] from within the app.

*If the update does not appear immediately, try opening the App Store
Update tab and swiping down on the screen until it refreshes.

Ver. 15.3.0 Update Details

*New Awoken Skills (Skill Voice, Dungeon Bonus) have been added.
*Voice may be toggled on and off in the Options menu.
*Compatibility has been revised to iOS 10.0+.
*Maximum Monster Box size has been expanded from 5,000 to 6,000.
*The Privacy Policy has been updated.
*Social Media Link feature has been added to the Others menu.
*Matching Bonuses have been added to the Ranking Dungeon.

*Bugs have been fixed.

*For details, from within the app see Others > Links > Official Site

*If the update does not appear immediately, try opening the App Store
Update tab and swiping down on the screen until it refreshes.

Ver. 15.3.1 Update Details

*New Awoken Skills (Skill Voice, Dungeon Bonus) have been added.
*Voice may be toggled on and off in the Options menu.
*Compatibility has been revised to iOS 10.0+.
*Maximum Monster Box size has been expanded from 5,000 to 6,000.
*The Privacy Policy has been updated.
*Social Media Link feature has been added to the Others menu.
*Matching Bonuses have been added to the Ranking Dungeon.

*Bugs have been fixed.

*For details, from within the app see Others > Links > Official Site

*If the update does not appear immediately, try opening the App Store
Update tab and swiping down on the screen until it refreshes.

Ver. 16.0.0 Update Details

*App icon changed.
*Dungeon selection UI adjusted.
*Team edit screen UI adjusted.
*Setting your own monster as a Helper function added.
*Orb Skins may now be modified.
*Share Skin toggle added to Options.

*Bugs have been fixed.

*For details, from within the app see Others > Links > Official Site

*If the update does not appear immediately, try opening the App Store
Update tab and swiping down on the screen until it refreshes.

Ver. 16.2.0 Update Details

*Enhance Material monsters may now be stacked.
*The dungeon selection UI has been adjusted.
*The Edit Team UI has been adjusted, and a copy team feature has been added.
*The Monster Exchange categories have been changed.
*"Prioritize Team" has been added as a Change Order option. "In Use" in the "Sort" screen has been removed.
*Assisting Monsters may now be selected from the Select Assist screen.
*Level Breakthrough UI adjustments.
*Colorblind options have been added to the Orb Skins.
*File size now displayed when downloading data.
*The [L] Increased Attack Awoken Skill's effect has been adjusted.
*The Improved Healing, Improved RCV+, and All Stats Enhanced Latent Awoken Skills' effects have been adjusted.
*The User HUD at the top of the screen may now be hidden on the rank screen of the Ranking Dungeons.

*Bugs have been fixed.

*For details, from within the app see Others > Links > Official Site

Ver. 16.2.1 Update Details

*Bugs have been fixed.
*Other miscellaneous improvements.

* For details, from within the app see Others > Links > Official Site

*If the update does not appear immediately, try opening the App Store
Update tab and swiping down on the screen until it refreshes.

Ver. 16.3.0 Update Details

*The [L] Damage Reduction Awoken Skill's been renamed and its affect adjusted.
*Ranking Dungeon unlock requirements have changed.
*The rank-up effect may now be skipped.
*Bugs have been fixed.

* For details, from within the app see Others > Links > Official Site

*If the update does not appear immediately, try opening the App Store
Update tab and swiping down on the screen until it refreshes.

Ver. 17.0.0 Update Details

*The Monster menu UI has been renewed.
*The Shop menu UI has been renewed.
*The Friends menu UI has been renewed.
*Monster Enhancements has been renamed to Extra Enhancements.
*The Extra Enhancements UI has been renewed.
*Selected monsters may now be enhanced directly from the Edit Team and Monster Box interfaces.

*Bugs have been fixed.

*For details, see [Others > Links > Official Site] from within the app

*If the update does not appear immediately, try opening the App Store's
Update tab and swiping down on the screen until it refreshes.

Ver. 17.1.0 Update Details

*At the floor screen, tapping and holding a monster's thumbnail reveals monster details.
*When sorting by the same leader, the list will now also include leaders from all created teams.
*New Awoken Skills have been added: Reduced HP, Reduced Attack, and Reduced Recovery.
*Bugs have been fixed.

*For details, see [Others > Links > Official Site] from within the app.

*If the update does not appear immediately, try opening the App Store's
Update tab and swiping down on the screen until it refreshes.

Ver. 17.2.0 Update Details

*"Ultimate Devolution" has been renamed "Devolution".
*Monsters who have performed an Assist Evolution may now be devolved.
*Select Awoken Skill effects have been upgraded.
*Bugs have been fixed.

*For details, see [Others > Links > Official Site] from within the app.

*If the update does not appear immediately, try opening the App Store
Update tab and swiping down on the screen until it refreshes.

Ver. 17.3.0 Update Details

*Up to five monsters may now be submitted for trading.
*Up to three trades may be conducted simultaneously.
*The requirement that players must be Friends for 30+ days to trade monsters has been removed.
*For some monsters, up to 30 monsters may be exchanged at once at the Monster Exchange.
*Resistance-Blind+, Resistance-Jammers+, Resistance-Poison+, Blessing of Jammers, and Blessing of Poison Orbs Awoken Skills have been added.
*The Super Bonus Attack Awoken Skill has had its effect adjusted and has a new icon.
*The Reduced HP, Reduced Attack, and Reduced Recovery Awoken Skills have new icons.
*Bugs have been fixed.

*For details, see [Others > Links > Official Site] from within the app.

*If the update does not appear immediately, try opening the App Store's
Update tab and swiping down on the screen until it refreshes.

Ver. 18.0.0 Update Details

*The Evolution Search function now allows players to view monster evolution paths.
*Individual monsters' attack multipliers can now be displayed. This feature can be toggled on/off from [Others > Options].
*Missing Evo Materials may now be purchased from the Evolve screen.
*The Trade function now displays how many of a given monster other players are seeking.
*Search function has been added to the Monster Box.
*Magic Stone Balances can now be viewed from the [Others > User Info].

*Bugs have been fixed.

*For details, see [Others > Links > Official Site] from within the app.

*If the update does not appear immediately, try opening the App Store's
Update tab and swiping down on the screen until it refreshes.

Ver. 18.1.0 Update Details

*A brand new experience, Story Dungeon has been added. Unlocks at Rank 20.
*Additional Latent Awoken Skill slots can now be unlocked for select monsters.
*Monster Attack Multiplier displays have been improved.

*Bugs have been fixed.

*For details, see [Others > Links > Official Site] from within the app.

Ver. 18.1.1 Update Details

*Bugs have been fixed.
*Other miscellaneous improvements.

*For details, see [Others > Links > Official Site] from within the app.

*If the update does not appear immediately, try opening the App Store's
Update tab and swiping down on the screen until it refreshes.

Ver. 18.2.0 Update Details

*A new chapter has been added to the story dungeon: Odin's Chapter.
*Monster Name search has been added to the Helper selection and Monster Exchange screens.
*Cost +100 badge has been changed to Cost âˆž badge.
*Maximum Monster Box size has been expanded from 7,000 to 8,000.
*The maximum number of Friends has been raised from 300 to 400.
*A new option has been added to the Others > Device Change/Social Media Linking menu.

*Bugs have been fixed.

*For details, see [Others > Links > Official Site] from within the app.

*If the update does not appear immediately, try opening the App Store's
Update tab and swiping down on the screen until it refreshes.

Ver. 18.3.0 Update Details

*The requirements for unlocking the 7th and 8th Latent Awoken Skill slots have been adjusted.
*New Latent Awoken Skills have been added.
*Some Awoken Skill effects have been adjusted.
*With some exceptions, Awoken badges and Super Awakenings now apply within 3-Player Multiplayer.
*The display filter menu within the Monster Box, etc., has been adjusted.
Settings may be changed at Options > System > Custom Filter.

*Bugs have been fixed.

*For details, see [Others > Links > Official Site] from within the app.

*If the update does not appear immediately, try opening the App Store's
Update tab and swiping down on the screen until it refreshes.

Ver. 18.3.1 Update Details

*P&D Pass monthly subscription service added.
*Initial Monster Box size has been increased from 100 to 200.
Existing players will also receive 100 extra slots.

*Bugs have been fixed.

*For details, see [Others > Links > Official Site] from within the app.

*If the update does not appear immediately, try opening the App Store's
Update tab and swiping down on the screen until it refreshes.

Ver. 18.4.0 Update Details

*Full screen compatibility has been added for iPad devices.
*The Super Bonus Attack Awoken Skill has had its effect adjusted.
*Some Ultimate Evolutions have been recategorized as Super Ultimate Evolutions.
*Maximum Monster Box size has been increased from 8,100 to 9,000.
*Helper Monsters can now be selected as Sub Monsters in the Edit Team menu.
Selecting a Helper Monster will automatically remove them from all Helper Monster slots.
*Super Awakenings and Level Limit Breakthroughs have been added as filters in the Change Order menu.

*Bugs have been fixed.

*For details, see [Others > Links > Official Site] from within the app.

*If the update does not appear immediately, try opening the App Store's
Update tab and swiping down on the screen until it refreshes.

Ver. 18.5.0 Update Details

*The full screen display on iPad devices now has additional information display options.
*Players with crowns can choose which one to display using the Crown Settings option.
*A new Recording mode has been added, allowing players to hide the display of all in-game player names and User IDs.
*Players can now watch videos in-app to increase the size of their Monster Box.

*The Reduced HP Awoken Skill effect has been adjusted.
*The Att. Absorption Piercer Latent Awoken Skill effect has been adjusted.

*Bugs have been fixed.

*For details, see [Others > Links > Official Site] from within the app.

*If the update does not appear immediately, try opening the App Store's
Update tab and swiping down on the screen until it refreshes.

Ver. 18.5.1 Update Details

*Bugs have been fixed.
*Other miscellaneous improvements.

*For details, see [Others > Links > Official Site] from within the app.

*If the update does not appear immediately, try opening the App Store's
Update tab and swiping down on the screen until it refreshes.

Ver. 18.5.2 Update Details

*The Filter and Custom Filter menus in the Monster Box have been updated.
*Monsters assigned as Assist monsters may no longer be evolved or devolved.
*New Latent Awoken Skills have been added.
*New effects have been added to the Skill Voice Awoken Skill.
*The Recover Bind Awoken Skill is no longer affected by Awoken Skill voiding effects.

*Bugs have been fixed.

*For details, see [Others > Links > Official Site] from within the app.

*If the update does not appear immediately, try opening the App Store's
Update tab and swiping down on the screen until update is displayed.

Ver. 18.7.0 Update Details

*The app compatibility has been revised to devices running iOS 11 or newer.
*Sub-Attributes may now be included when filtering by Attribute.
*The Awoken Skill search Custom Filter now includes Latent Awoken Skills. Super Awoken Skill and Assisting monsters' Awoken Skills may also be selected and searched.
*New Awoken Skills such as Improved Fire Combos have been added.
*The Enhanced Att. Awoken Skills have had their names changed and effects adjusted.
*Players with Title Badges may now select which one to display.
*Any Attribute Py may be used to grant a Skill Level Up to monsters that only possess Sub-Attributes.
*New attack effects may be toggled.
*Players may now watch videos in-app to recover Stamina.

*Bugs have been fixed.

*For details, see [Others > Links > Official Site] from within the app.

*If the update does not appear immediately, try opening the App Store's
Update tab and swiping down on the screen until update is displayed.

Ver. 18.8.0 Update Details

*Redeemable Material Monsters are now stored as stacks within the Monster Box.
*The maximum Monster Box size has been increased from 9,000 to 9,500.
*A portion of the "New Effects" have been modified.

*Bugs have been fixed.

*For details, see [Others > Links > Official Site] from within the app.
